content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_explorer

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=2024/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];

--Saber el tipo de dato de cada columna

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''vehicle_registration_parquet/year=2024/month=01/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''electric_vehicle_data_bronze'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result];'


--Definir columnas y tipos de datos
SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=2024/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
        WITH (
            vehicleId           INT,
            locationId          SMALLINT,
            propietaryId        TINYINT,
            dolVehicleId        INT,
            registrationDate    DATETIME2(7)
        )AS [result];


/*
--TAREA
1) Query from folders using wildcard characters
2) Use filename function.
3) Query from subfolders
4) Use filepath function to select only from certain partitions

*/

--1) Query from folders using wildcard characters
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=2024/month=01/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS vr_data;

--2) Use filename function.
SELECT TOP 100 
    vr_data.filename() as file_name,
    vr_data.*
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=2024/month=01/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS vr_data;

--3) Query from subfolders
SELECT TOP 100 
    vr_data.filename() as file_name,
    vr_data.*
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS vr_data;

--4) Use filepath function to select only from certain partitions
SELECT  
    vr_data.filepath(1) as year,
    vr_data.filepath(2) as month,
    count(1) as record_count
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS vr_data
WHERE vr_data.filepath(1) = '2024'
    AND vr_data.filepath(2) IN ('06','07','08')
GROUP BY vr_data.filepath(1),vr_data.filepath(2)
ORDER BY vr_data.filepath(1),vr_data.filepath(2);
